name: Ski Jumping Pro VR
description:
Ski Jumping Pro VR delivers the thrills of hurtling down a snow-packed ski ramp like no other game. Enjoy an ultra-realistic VR experience with the sensation of incomparable height and speed.

Keep your balance and land like a Pro to become the most successful Ski Jumper. A full single-player career mode and multiple tournaments make Ski Jumping Pro VR the ultimate winter sports simulation.
